text: Hello guys, is there a way to add some other images on blog-listing except the featured image. I don't want to use the featured image  but I am not seeing any other possibility

Hi,

Does anyone know if there’s a url parameter I can add to  links in marketing emails that prevents identity tracking url parameters from being applied?
Or is there an alternate solution?
I see in settings there is a global on/off toggle, I need to be able to disable tracking for only a selection of marketing emails.

Thanks

Good morning all, i need some clarifycation. i'm going to use the business unit add on for the huspot marketing enterprise license. the issue i will find is the following: i have one contacts shared for the 3 brands, each brand create a different deal for this contact, with this add-on the rep sales of brand A should not see the deal of the brand B, and the activity email of brand B owned by a different rep sales. is it possible?
Is there a way to set up/demo payment options in a developer account? I want to get to grips with it

Hi <@U04CXN2QUR0>! A contact was looking for Marketing Automation based here. I think they may have already got  someone for the job since I posted this. But if you're open to work I'll definitely stay connected for future stuff. We're based in Toronto too!
Hey! Who can tell me exactly what permission item a user has to have to be able to access "Developer Info" from the HubSpot menu?
To *access* the *developer info* for a page, select the *HubSpot* sprocket icon in the top right hand corner of live pages > *Developer Info*
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/debugging-and-errors>

Right... which is what I have in the screenshot. :slightly_smiling_face: I just have a user that is getting a 401 error when clicking on it, so trying to track down what he needs permission for to gain access to it.
Does he have the "Design Tools" permission?
<@UBT0AHWLD> Yes he does.

HI! This is a question about lottie / player issue if you have any info

I have a client that has this file (<https://adaptiva.com/hubfs/Comprehensive%20Patch%20Catalog.json>) When I preview it from the <https://lottiefiles.com/web-player> website, it shows the animation correct(where the blue background spans the “table header” However when I use the script tag on a website page, it doesn’t show correctly. <https://adaptiva-test-sandbox-1-adaptiva-21084263.hs-sites.com/sb-testing> -- you can see the blue area doesn’t span the whole “table header”
```<script src="<https://unpkg.com/@lottiefiles/lottie-player@latest/dist/lottie-player.js>"></script>
<lottie-player src="<https://adaptiva.com/hubfs/Comprehensive%20Patch%20Catalog.json>"  background="transparent"  speed="1"  style="width: 300px; height: 300px;"  loop controls autoplay></lottie-player>```
is there a way to clone custom modules at the page level?? so the content creator doesn't have to type in all the content again??
I’ve teseted this inside and outside of HubSpot, so it isn’t a HubSpot issue — anyone know anything about this?
I think it has to be in the theme dnd thingy doer and not a flex column
or, maybe you are targeting the flex column there and you need to be targeting the module
hmm -- i'm targeting the module
but it's in a flex column <@U25PYL3Q8>
is that the issue ?? the fact that it's in a flex col??
yeah I think that is it — I just checked one of my older sites that uses flex columns
has the same options you do
hmmm - thanks bro

you could check with your CAM if they can ungate it for you, I'm not sure if that would work with payments since you have to go through the process of submitting your application to actually use the tool
Cheers <@U03AKL6Q1B2>. I'll reach out and see what they say

```	<script src="<https://unpkg.com/@lottiefiles/lottie-player@1.4.3/dist/lottie-player.js>"></script>```
So if you have a problem with your lottie animations playing, you can try reverting back to an older version. I haven’t figured out WHY I need to do this, I’m guessing updates in the player and compatibility with some after effects items are causing this and need to be redone.

Hey all, I'm doing some form styling and everything is looking great when each field is on it's own row, but whenever I add two fields side-by-side in the editor, they're showing up as not full-length and still stacked on the styling (first name and last name in the screenshot attached). I think I figured out why it's happening (the hs-form-field class has a default width of 50%, and the form styling has the entire form's width at less than 100%), but I'm not sure how to solve for this. Any ideas or insights? thank you!!
